DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : I . Evaluate efficacy paclitaxel carboplatin amifostine progression free survival overall survival patient metastatic recurrent epithelial endometrial carcinoma amenable surgery radiotherapy . II . Evaluate response ( confirm unconfirmed partial response complete response ) rate regimen patient population . III . Assess nature degree toxicity regimen patient . OUTLINE : Patients receive paclitaxel IV 3 hour , amifostine IV 10 minute , follow fifteen minute later carboplatin IV 30-60 minute day 1 . Courses repeat every 28 day . Treatment continue 6 course absence disease progression . Patients follow every 6 month 2 year , annually thereafter . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 35 50 patient accrue study .
